metadata.title: CVE-2024-27402 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:phonet/pep: fix racy skb_queue_empty() use The receive queues are protectedby their respective spin-lock, not the socket lock. This could lead toskb_peek() unexpectedly returning NULL or a pointer to an already dequeuedsocket buffer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
